Pre-Game Insights: The Timberwolves have gone 9-6 in home games.
Minnesota is 6-2 in games decided by less than 4 points.
Boston is 9-4 against opponents with a winning record.
The Timberwolves average 14.9 made 3-pointers per game, 2.3 more made shots on average than the 12.6 per game the Celtics allow.
The Celtics average 12.2 more points per game (119.6) than the Timberwolves give up to opponents (107.4).
Anthony Edwards is shooting 44.3% and averaging 24.8 points for the Timberwolves.
Jayson Tatum is scoring 28.3 points per game with 9.5 rebounds and 5.5 assists for the Celtics.
